title: why all the LFT threads
body: just look at the other forum threads, you'll get a bunch of candidates, just make ur own team...

replies.body:
my guess is some people have beta mindsets and don't want the responsibility of being "in charge" of a team or creating one but would like to play in one.

Its a lot easier to follow plans then to create them.

it serves the purpose to remind all the people on boards that other threads like theirs exists and that instead of making new threads over and over they should just collaborate and make a team with the people with existing threads you obnoxious turd
so you thought you would make a useless thread about too many threads being made
